thread.title: Weak Mag. 2.7 Earthquake - 46 km Northwest of Muroran, Hokkaido, Japan, on Thursday, Nov 20, 2025, at 03:51 am (GMT +9)

author: @EQAlerts
title: Weak Mag. 2.7 Earthquake - 46 km Northwest of Muroran, Hokkaido, Japan, on Thursday, Nov 20, 2025, at 03:51 am (GMT +9)
text:
Translate
Kutchan, Hokkaido, Japan (24.2 km N of epicenter) [Map] / Weak shaking (MMI III) / rattling, vibrating / 2-5 s
Kutchan, Hokkaido, Japan (24.2 km N of epicenter) [Map] / Weak shaking (MMI III) / rattling, vibrating / 2-5 s
A light magnitude 2.7 earthquake hit 46 km (29 mi) away from Muroran, Hokkaido, Japan, in the early morning of Thursday, Nov 20, 2025 at 3.51 am local time (GMT +9). The quake had a moderate depth of 157 km (97 mi) and was reported felt by some people near the epicenter.
